xboxlive_stats_delete_stat.htm+html.head: xboxlive_stats_delete_stat.htm+html.body.p:87-3
xboxlive_stats_delete_stat: This function can be used to delete a stat from the stat manager for the given user ID. You supply the user ID as returned by (for example) the function xboxlive_get_user(), then the stat string to delete. This clears the stat value and removed it from the stat manager, meaning it will no longer be returned by the functions xboxlive_stats_get_stat_names() or xboxlive_stats_get_stat().

xboxlive_stats_delete_stat: The function will will return -1 if there was an error or the user ID is invalid, or any other value if the function was successfully called
